level.title: Disk and Storage Management
level.description: Learn to manage disk space, partitions, and storage

exercises.title: Check Disk Usage
exercises.description: Use 'df -h' to display human-readable disk space.
hints: df -h shows disk usage in GB/MB

exercises.title: Check Directory Size
exercises.description: Use 'du -sh' to get total size of a directory.

exercises.title: Find Large Files
exercises.description: Use 'find' with '-size' to locate files larger than 100MB.

exercises.title: Monitor Disk I/O
exercises.description: Use 'iostat' to view disk input/output statistics.
hints: May need to install sysstat package

exercises.title: Check Inode Usage
exercises.description: Use 'df -i' to display inode usage instead of disk space.
